DOC.brief_title: Single Rising Doses BI 655064 Healthy Chinese Japanese Male Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Healthy male base upon complete medical history , include physical examination , vital sign ( BP , PR ) , 12lead ECG , clinical laboratory test Chinese ethnicity , Japanese ethnicity accord follow criterion . Japanese : born Japan , live outside Japan < 10 year , parent grandparent born Japan . Chinese : ethnic Chinese , born China ethnic Chinese born outside China , descendent 4 ethnic Chinese grandparent bear China Age within range 20 45 year inclusive Body mass index within range 18.5 25 kg/m2 inclusive Signed date write informed consent prior admission study accordance GCP local legislation . Exclusion criterion : Any find medical examination ( include BP , PR ECG ) deviate normal clinical relevance Any disease clinically relevant abnormality laboratory parameter , accord investigator , might compromise safety subject interfere subject participation trial compromise trial objective Gastrointestinal , hepatic , renal , respiratory , cardiovascular , metabolic , immunological hormonal disorder Diseases central nervous system ( epilepsy ) psychiatric disorder neurological disorder History relevant orthostatic hypotension , faint spell blackout . Chronic relevant acute infection
